data.eml:eml: The Rijn & IJssel Water Board carries out water management in the east of Gelderland, the southern part of Overijssel and the southeast of the Veluwe. It oversees an area of over 200,000 ha.Positive observations without protocolDataset available via https://www.ndff.nl/english / serviceteamndff@natuurloket.nl8,964 records (March 2018)
